title: Mutt & Run
desc: Sole developer/designer on an endless runner mobile game out on the Google Play Store. Play as a dog running through fields of trees in order to grab as many treats as you can!

title: Dungeon DOM
desc: Co-Developing a rogue-lite dungeon crawler. The app is built in Vanilla JS using the Web Component API. I've been in charge of most of the data handling and game logic using up-to-date ES6 standards. I also built a custom suite of icons used in-game.

title: Brad's Deals Shopping Guide
desc: Worked with UX team to develop Brad's Deals' first push into mobile-first, responsive design. Our work on the shopping guide would later become the blueprint for the entire website's mobile-first redesign.

title: Artedi Diving App
desc: Original developer for a scientific diving school based in Puerto Rico. Built an app students could use underwater to survey fish and export their survey data, saving hours of post-dive data entry work in the lab.
